settings.heading: shop local, or ship sunflour nationwide

settings.text: Ship our mouth-watering, freshly made pastries and treats nationwide, or place a local order for pickup or delivery!

settings.subheading: Shop Local, or Ship Sunflour Nationwide!
settings.heading: Eat. Send. Love.
settings.description: Ship our mouth-watering, freshly made pastries and treats nationwide, or place a local order for pickup or delivery!

settings.heading: Freshly Baked Pastries Shipped Nationwide
settings.description: Browse our most popular items. Select your delivery date at checkout.

settings.des: Cake Jars are one of our signature products and available to ship nationwide anytime. Mix and match flavors to create your own bundles.
Give a cookie to your guests on the way out the door and be the wedding they talk about with their friends.
Welcome new members to your team or just show your employee appreciate throughout the year.
Send any of our products as a delcious birthday surprise, or check out our Pastry Pouch designed specifically for b-days!
When a simple thank you won't do. Say thank you in the sweetest way. Include a note with any order.
Congratulate recent grads on their achievement and give them a sweet send-off into the real world.

settings.heading: Be the Undisputed Gifting Champion
settings.description: Send a sweet gift to anyone in the US. Schedule your delivery so it arrives on the correct day. Birthdays, weddings, corporate, you name it!

settings.heading: charlotte's favorite bakery
settings.description: backyard BBQs and picnics in the park - there are so many reasons to get more dessert in your life this summer! BYOC (cake!) to all the occasions by ordering award-winning treats for delivery now.

settings.heading: shop our best sellers
settings.description: Iconic layer cakes with unfrosted sides, gooey pie, and fudgy Cake Truffles.

settings.heading: Sourdough English Muffins
settings.text: Our signature Sourdough English Muffins are Thick, Tangy and Irresistible! Cooked up fresh every day these monster muffins will make your kitchen the envy of the neighborhood. Be sure to split with a fork, toast well and slather with your favorite toppings. 6 per pack.

settings.heading: Cake Jars
settings.text: Treat yourself or send the perfect gift. Cupcakes in the mail complete with spoons and napkins. We think opening a box of cake jars will put a smile on anyone's face (making you the gift giving boss).

settings.heading: Charlotte's Favorite Bakery
settings.description: Order local pickup or delivery from Sunflour via Door Dash, or stop into any our five Charlotte locations, open daily from 7am to 4pm.

settings.heading: Local, Small-Batch Bakery
settings.text: At Sunflour we make everything from scratch and in small batches to ensure freshness and authenticity. Our team, both veteran and newly arrived, share these values and consistently strive to make our guests experience both delightful and memorable.

settings.name: Jay Poff
settings.des: Morning crew is always personable.  Everyone makes you feel welcome and appreciated.  Food and drink quality is always excellent.

settings.name: Shirlene Gray
settings.des: We travel from Monroe to eat at this Sunflour.  Great gluten free options.  Love the atmosphere, too!  I enjoy the Avocado Toast.  My daughter absolutely loves the biscuit.  Usually the gluten free options are a cookie, a scone, a donut, and a muffin.

settings.name: Quality Services
settings.des: Excelente lugar y muy buena atencin, las chicas son muy amables.

settings.name: Bailey Seighman
settings.des: The food was great. It was exciting to see so many gluten-free options!

settings.name: James Holder
settings.des:
My fiance & I had a great wedding vegan cake testing experience with Lola!

She was very patience, friendly with great customer service.

They accommodate customers with dietary restrictions. Lots of flavors to pick from!

I highly recommend

settings.name: J Team
settings.des: Staff friendly, food fresh n coffee nice and hot.  Great spot to stop and meet up with a friend or two

settings.name: Erin Acaley
settings.des: We ordered a gender reveal cake and are so happy with how it turned out! I worked with Karmen to order it and she was responsive and helpful. Thank you so much!

settings.name: Fred B
settings.text: il caff  meraviglioso, i dolci sono ottimi, non posso lamentarmi e per un italiano  davvero molto buono.

settings.name: J. Team
settings.text: staff friendly, food fresh n coffee nice and hot.  Great spot to stop and meet up with a friend or two

settings.name: Sheila Dennis
settings.text: lovely place, good service, excellent products. breakfast sandwiches are terrific!

settings.question: Do you ship nationwide?
settings.answer: Yes! We ship select bakery goods nationwide and offer local delivery right from our website. We also offer Catering services.

settings.question: Do you have gift cards?
settings.answer: Yes we do! Gift cards may be purchased and used in our stores. Old school paper only!

settings.question: When do you stop serving breakfast?
settings.answer: We dont! You can get breakfast all day long, no judging.

settings.question: Do you offer gluten-free or vegan options?
settings.answer: Yes we do! We regularly stock vegan cookies, muffins, bread and other treats. Gluten free items regularly in stock include cheesecakes, chocolate souffl cakes, coconut macaroons and other options. Please note: while these items are made without gluten, our bakeries are NOT gluten free facilities so trace levels of gluten are possible.

settings.question: Are your products organic?
settings.answer: Some items, such as the coffees and teas, are strictly organic. Most bakery items are not. However, everything is made from scratch, from all natural ingredients. We dont use any artificial flavorings, preservatives, dough conditioners, bleached or bromated flour.

settings.question: Do you make custom cakes?
settings.answer: Absolutely! We make cakes for weddings, birthdays, graduations and celebrations of all kinds. We make layer cakes, but not tiered cakes (different size layers). We also make and ship custom packs of Cake Jars.

settings.question: How far in advance do I need to place an order?
settings.answer: We require 48 hours after having confirmed your request to prepare your order.

settings.question: Do you offer day-old bread or pastries?
settings.answer: Yes we do, but we also dont want to see anyone go hungry. At the end of each day, some of our unsold baked goods are packed up and given to the Salvation Army and other charities who provide food for individuals and families in crisis.

settings.question: Where is my favorite pastry today?
settings.answer: Some items are seasonal and are not available year round. Also, to ensure freshness we follow a small batch process so some items may temporarily sell out during the day. Please call ahead to reserve your favorite item if you absolutely cannot do without!

settings.question: Is Sunflour a franchise or chain?
settings.answer: No. We are a local, family owned bakery with multiple locations in the Charlotte area. Everything is made fresh onsite and our staff rotate between stores to ensure consistency of products and service.

settings.question: Are you hiring?
settings.answer: We are always interested in qualified candidates for any position. Please submit your resume here.
